Configure General Table Options

Source: R/hot_functions.R
hot_table.Rd

Configure General Table Options

Usage

hot_table(
  hot,
  contextMenu = NULL,
  dropdownMenu = NULL,
  filters = NULL,
  manualColumnSorting = NULL,
  multiColumnSorting = NULL,
  search = NULL,
  undo = NULL,
  outsideClickDeselects = NULL,
  fillHandle = NULL,
  themeName = NULL,
  ...
)

Arguments

hot

A handsontable widget object

contextMenu

Logical or list, enable/configure context menu

dropdownMenu

Logical or list, enable/configure dropdown menu

filters

Logical, enable column filters

manualColumnSorting

Logical, enable manual column sorting

multiColumnSorting

Logical, enable multi-column sorting

search

Logical, enable search functionality

undo

Logical, enable undo/redo functionality

outsideClickDeselects

Logical, deselect on outside click

fillHandle

Logical or object, configure fill handle

themeName

Character, theme name (e.g., "ht-theme-main-dark-auto")

...

Additional table configuration options

Value

Modified handsontable widget

Examples

if (interactive()) {
  library(shiny)

  ui <- fluidPage(
    titlePanel("Table Features"),
    handsontableOutput("table")
  )

  server <- function(input, output, session) {
    output$table <- renderHandsontable({
      handsontable(iris[1:20, ]) |>
        hot_table(
          contextMenu = TRUE,
          filters = TRUE,
          manualColumnSorting = TRUE,
          search = TRUE,
          undo = TRUE
        )
    })
  }

  shinyApp(ui, server)
}
